content.text: I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm really passionate about animals. I have a black and white cat named Cow.
That's really cool! I've always wanted a cat, but I'm allergic.
Oh, that's too bad. What are you doing now?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to figure out who I am and what I want to do with my life.
That's okay, it takes time to figure things out. What are you unsure of?
I'm not sure of a lot of things, but I'm especially unsure of who I'm attracted to. I've never had a boyfriend or girlfriend, and I'm not sure if I'm attracted to men or women.
Oh, I see. That's a tough question. Do you have any friends who you can talk to about it?
I do, but I'm not sure if they can help me. I'm afraid of being rejected by them, or of them thinking I'm weird.
I understand. It's not always easy to talk about these things with people. But I think it's important to talk to someone, even if it's just a therapist.
Yeah, I think you're right. I'll try to find someone to talk to.
Good. I'm here for you if you need anything.
